item.title: SF3co: Eco Friendly Guitar
item.description: The most important thing to do in your life is to not interfere with somebody else's life. Frank Zappa I doubt Zappa had any kind of ecological issues in mind when he said this but I'll happily quote one of my heroes when his words sum up my feelings so perfectly. Background: The Problem When I first became interested in guitars and music I had no idea where the materials for new instruments came from or who made them.
